title: Leyla and Mecnun
synopsis: Destiny brings Mecnun and Leyla together as newborns, and again years later. Despite unexpected turns in Mecnuns zany life, Leyla remains a constant.

title: Babam ve Oğlum
synopsis: Following Turkeys bloody coup of 1980, a widowed reporter returns to his Aegean hometown, bringing his son and a last wish for his estranged father.

title: G.O.R.A
synopsis: Carpet dealer and UFO photo forger Arif is abducted by aliens. On the planet Gora, he helps friends escape from a meteorite strike and find freedom.

title: Celal and Ceren
synopsis: After a night of hard partying costs him Ceren, his long-term girlfriend, Celal sets out to win her heart all over again.

title: Vizontele
synopsis: In 1974, a rural town in Anatolia gets its first television set -- an event thats met with both excitement and trepidation by the villagers.

title: Behzat Ç
synopsis: An Ankara homicide detective with a dark personal life and a disdain for rules and political correctness solves murders and fights police corruption.

title: Organize Isler
synopsis: A gang leader recruits a suicidal Superman impersonator, while a woman driving a hot car linked to the gang plots revenge against them and their hero.

title: Recep Ivedik 1
synopsis: A man finds the wallet of a rich man and takes a rigorous trip in an old car to return it, finding an old love and a new life of luxury awaiting.

title: Düğün Dernek
synopsis: On the first day of Ramadan, Ismail joins friends on a road trip to a mosque and encounters his son, who, to Ismails chagrin, plans a hasty wedding.

title: Recep Ivedik 2
synopsis: When his grandmother takes ill, foolish brute Recep tries to satisfy her wishes by getting a job and attempting to find a suitable wife.

title: Eyyvah Eyyvah
synopsis: A clarinet player who lives with his grandparents in a small village is forced to move to Istanbul, where he meets a singer enjoying sudden fame.

title: The Butterflys Dream
synopsis: Forced to work in a coal mine during World War II, two young poets find some escape when they both fall for the same woman.

title: Recep Ivedik 3
synopsis: After his grandmother dies, Recep is inconsolable until a distantly related girl who needs a home moves in with him and changes his life.

title: Aşk Tesadüfleri Sever
synopsis: A series of coincidences brings two star-crossed lovers together, but fate pulls them apart until they encounter each other again in Istanbul.

title: Recep Ivedik 4
synopsis: When the lot where he coaches youth soccer is sold off, the oafish Recep enters a reality TV competition to raise money and buy back the land.

title: Magnificent Century
synopsis: Palace intrigue roils a mighty empire in this drama tracing the reign of Ottoman Sultan Suleiman the Magnificent and the slave who became his wife.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Vizontele Tuuba
synopsis: With civil war looming, a TV-obsessed Turkish town is bemused when a bureaucrat and his daughter arrive to modernize their library.

title: Eyyvah Eyyvah 2
synopsis: Hüseyin has found his father, and now has one more mission -- to get together with the girl of his dreams, with a little help from his new friend.

title: Bana Masal Anlatma
synopsis: Minibus driver Riza is a steady presence in his close-knit neighborhood, until he brings home a dreamy beauty and throws everything into chaos.

title: I Saw the Sun
synopsis: Mahsun Kirmizigül directs this dramatic saga that follows the varying fortunes of the extended Altun family, a Turkish clan forced by the government to abandon their ancestral frontier village and relocate to bustling Istanbul.

title: Limonata
synopsis: To grant his dying fathers wish, a young man drives to Istanbul in an old clunker to find his illegitimate brother and bring him back to Macedonia.

title: Dügün Dernek 2: Sünnet
synopsis: Ismail and his old screwball crew land themselves in hot water when his grandsons circumcision evolves into a buzz-making citywide event.

title: Mucize
synopsis: Sent away from his family to a remote mountain town, teacher Mahir helps the villagers build a school -- and inspires a path to hope for them all.

title: Beynelmilel
synopsis: When a local musician and his band are forced to perform in honor of a right-wing coup, his daughter schemes to make their music subversive instead.

title: Neseli Hayat
synopsis: Burdened by troubles and caught between cultures, Riza takes a job as a mall Santa and finds that real life may not be so different from make believe.

title: Berlin Kaplani
synopsis: After a losing streak puts him in debt of 50,000 euros to his sponsors, an unlikely Turkish-German boxer in Berlin finds himself in need of a miracle.

title: Kara Bela
synopsis: The uneventful life of middle-aged Kudret turns upside down when a road trip turns into a wild race for survival with killers in hot pursuit.

title: Patron Mutlu Son Istiyor
synopsis: Sent to a remote village to write a screenplay, Sinan finds inspiration to spare in colorful locals, farcical misadventures and the craziness of love.

title: Eyyvah Eyyvah 3
synopsis: Life is tough for Hüseyin after marrying his true love. He works day and night to support his growing family, while singer Firuzan copes with fame.

title: Hükümet Kadın
synopsis: When an uneducated mother of eight suddenly becomes mayor, she uses the skills shes learned as a housewife to keep her town running like clockwork.

title: Sen Kimsin?
synopsis: Desperate for cash, klutzy private investigator Tekin searches for a wealthy womans missing girl but faces one surprise and mishap after another.

title: Romantik Komedi
synopsis: Bored with her life and inspired by a friends wedding, Esra quits her job and dumps her boyfriend, leading to a series of romantic misadventures.

title: Osman Pazarlama
synopsis: Hoping to make his fortune and win the girl of his dreams, fast-talking Osman invents and tries to promote one preposterous gadget after another.

title: Game of Silence
synopsis: Twenty years after four little boys vowed to remain silent about a horrific crime, the past reemerges with an opportunity for revenge.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Husband Factor
synopsis: A 30-year-old whos never taken the traditional path to love is tutored by her friends and family before reconnecting with her high school crush.

title: Çok Filim Hareketler Bunlar
synopsis: Vignettes of the summer holidays follow vacationers as they battle mosquitoes, suffer ruined plans and otherwise hit snags in their precious time off.

title: Hadi İnşallah
synopsis: A young woman recovering poorly from a bad romance gets a new lease on life after encountering a handsome man during a job interview.
A genetics professor experiments with a treatment for his comatose sister that blends medical and shamanic cures, but unlocks a shocking side effect.

title: Sadece Sen
synopsis: An ex-boxer falls in love with a blind woman and starts to build a new life, but his violent past returns to endanger them both.

title: Romantik Komedi 2: Bekarlığa Veda
synopsis: Didem tries everything to get actor Cem to propose to her, but hes got other things on his mind: a beautiful new co-star and a secret bachelor party.

title: Hükümet Kadın 2
synopsis: In 1949, with freedoms threatened, housewife Hükümet is unaware of her future life in politics as she faces off with liar and mayoral hopeful Faruk.

title: Incir Receli 2
synopsis: Grief-stricken over the death of his true love, singer-songwriter Metin has given up on life, until he meets Gizem, who slowly reawakens his heart.

title: Ekşi Elmalar
synopsis: In an eastern Turkish town, suitors knock on the door of the mayor and father of three beautiful daughters who choose to follow their own paths.

title: İstanbul Kırmızısı
synopsis: Upon his return to Istanbul, an expat writer-editor finds himself stranded inside a web of tangled relationships after his filmmaker friend vanishes.

title: Deliha
synopsis: Short on sense but long on self-confidence, dotty Deliha sets her sights on a hunky photographer who opens up shop in her neighborhood.

title: Zenne Dancer
synopsis: In this fact-based tale, gay Ahmet is inspired by a male belly dancer and a naive lover to come out to his conservative family, with tragic results.

title: Içimdeki Ses
synopsis: Insecure writer Selim finds a chance at happiness with Aysil, the girl of his dreams, but his live-in mother is keeping a watchful eye on her son.

title: Dedemin Fisi
synopsis: When a brain-dead family patriarch is about to be taken off life support, his extended family gathers round and plots to see wholl get his money.

title: Filinta
synopsis: In 19th-century Istanbul, a young police officer investigates crimes and falls in love with the daughter of a wealthy merchant conspiring against him.

title: Labirent
synopsis: After a massive Istanbul explosion, an elite band of Turkish intelligence officers dog a new terrorist group, often at odds with the U.S. and Britain.

title: Kocan Kadar Konus 2: Dirilis
synopsis: Efsun has found Mr. Right in Sinan, and their relationship is taking a serious turn. But their eccentric families quickly complicate the romance.

title: Niyazi Gül Dörtnala
synopsis: Seeking the formula behind a magical elixir bequeathed to him by his father, a veterinary professor gets embroiled in a mobsters horse-racing scheme.

title: Küçük Esnaf
synopsis: As an honest locksmith scrambles to pay his late fathers hefty debt to the mafia, he crosses paths with a woman in similar trouble and falls for her.

title: Kurtulus Son Durak
synopsis: When a recently single psychologist moves to a new neighborhood, she finds friendship with women starting to rebel against years of domestic abuse.

title: Çarsi Pazar
synopsis: The slacker owner of a public bath house rallies his community to save it when a big developer comes to town to close it down and open a new mall.

title: Görümce
synopsis: When his jealous sister plots to wreck his engagement, a young man does everything he can to protect his betrothed from her devious schemes.

title: Subat
synopsis: An orphan subjected to tests that gave him superpowers is rescued and raised on Istanbuls streets, where he falls for a reporter linked to his past.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Yunus Emre
synopsis: During the Mongol invasions, Yunus Emre leaves his home to travel across the Ottoman Empire, defying hardships and temptations to become a dervish.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Clair Obscur
synopsis: While examining a young woman who has just murdered her husband and mother-in-law, a psychiatrist begins to reflect on her own marriage.

title: The Plane Tree
synopsis: A matriarch and her grandson forge a special bond during family picnics every two months, until her health causes a conflict among the relatives.

title: Bir Baba Hindu
synopsis: A Istanbul mobster falls for an Indian yoga instructor whose abduction takes him on a wild rescue mission to Mumbai.

title: Çekmeceler
synopsis: After self-destruction puts her in the hospital, Deniz is forced to face memories of a controlling father obsessed with suppressing her sexuality.

title: Hayat Öpücügü
synopsis: High-strung Metin finally stops seeing doom and gloom around every corner when he meets vivacious Hayat, but she has her own soul-searching to do.

title: Erkekler
synopsis: A therapist and his patient try to understand their complex relationships with women and their not-so-complex relationships with their libidos.

title: Yanik Koza
synopsis: A secret marriage unites two families -- one wealthy and traditional, the other bankrupt and modern -- and is threatened by the resulting conflicts.

title: Gonul
synopsis: A nurse escapes from her surgeon fiancé after his ex reveals his dark secrets. She later finds love again, but a car accident changes everything.
